entry.title: $1900 // 3 bedroom 2 bath Nice schools Midwood current great starter home Midwo
entry.content: One floor living in it's finest, sick and tired of stairways? Ready to move into ranch style home, mid hundred years modern attraction. Hearth in oversized living room. Kitchen provides island and opens to dining room both have easy to deal with ceramic tiled floors. Kitchen overlooks fenced garden. 14x12 sunroom is a superb place to entertain & enjoy summer season. Three bedrooms give abundant closet space. One complete and one 3/4 . Cellar is spacious, includes a brick hearth, would make a fantastic family room or man cave, with just a couple finishing touches. One car attached garage, paved drive and properly landscaped fenced yard complete the bundle.. Cypress Hills Borough Park Bath Beach Brownsville
